scripts.build: cd ./client-side && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./cpi-side && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init: cd ./client-side && npm install && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm install && cd ..
scripts.publish-cpi-side-debug: cd cpi-side && npm run build:debug && cd .. && cpi-node-debug
scripts.cpi-publish-addon: cd ./cpi-side && npm run build:debug && cd .. && cpi-node-debug
